FULFILLMENT_STATUS_CODES.order-on-the-way: Hang tight! Your order's cruising over to you.
FULFILLMENT_STATUS_CODES.order-delivered: Package alert! Your order's been delivered.
FULFILLMENT_STATUS_CODES.ticket-issued: All set! Your ticket's ready to go.
FULFILLMENT_STATUS_CODES.ticket-validated: You're all good! Your ticket's been validated.
FULFILLMENT_STATUS_CODES.charging-started: Juice up! Your charging session's begun.
FULFILLMENT_STATUS_CODES.charging-stopped: Heads up! Your charging session's been paused.

FULFILLMENT_STATUS_CODES.charging-completed: Charged and ready! Your battery's full.

ALL_MESSAGES.session_cleared: Your session has been cleared! You're all set to start a new one.
ALL_MESSAGES.session_and_profile_cleared: Both your session and profile have been cleared! You're ready to start fresh.
ALL_MESSAGES.route_selected: Your route is all set! Here's your navigation link: ${url}. What's next on your agenda?
ALL_MESSAGES.request_in_progress: Hang tight! I'm currently processing your request...
ALL_MESSAGES.request_processed: All done! Your request has been processed and I'm getting your response ready...
ALL_MESSAGES.request_failed: Oops, hit a snag processing your request. Want to give it another shot?
ALL_MESSAGES.request_to_beckn_failed: Looks like I couldn't get that request through. How about we try something different?
ALL_MESSAGES.incident_on_road: Heads up: ${message}. Could you share your current location so I can find some alternative routes for you?
ALL_MESSAGES.formatting_failed: I had trouble understanding that instruction.
ALL_MESSAGES.api_call_failed: Oops, I ran into an issue calling the API.
ALL_MESSAGES.failed_to_process_instruction: I had trouble processing that instruction.
ALL_MESSAGES.missing_source: Mind sharing the starting point for your journey?
ALL_MESSAGES.missing_destination: Could you let us know your destination?
ALL_MESSAGES.route_list_description: Here are some route options for you. Which one do you prefer?
